mapper.select: select cp.cid cid,cp.cname cname,ul.uid uid,ul.telephone telephone,cm.operator operator,cm.total_money totalMoney from customer_manager cm join user_login ul ON cm.id=ul.uid join company cp on cp.uid=ul.uid where ul.uid=#{uid} and ul.status=1
mapper.update: update customer_manager set total_money=#{totalMoney} where uid=#{uid}
